text: Proverbs 22:7 – “The rich rules over the poor, And the borrower is servant to the lender.”
Proverbs 21:20 – “There is desirable treasure, And oil in the dwelling of the wise; But a foolish man squanders it.”
Proverbs 27:23 – “Be diligent to know the state of your flocks, And attend to your herds;”
